rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Interesting to listen to in class,very helpful. Classwork not hard but tests harder than you would expect. Draw a lot from the textbook.

The first half of the class was great. She took a trip to Ecuador for research in the middle of the semester and seemed to check out on us from that point forward. Still, she's an eloquent lecturer and never forces her opinions on the class. Always encourages class discussions. She touts her exams as super-hard, but they're not if you attend class.
